title.rendered: TAJ777NEWS Proudly Announces The Title Sponsorship with Salem Spartans for TNPL 2024

content.rendered:
In a significant development for cricket enthusiasts and sports marketing, TAJ777NEWS has proudly announced its title sponsorship of the Salem Spartans for the upcoming Tamil Nadu Premier League (TNPL) 2024 season. This partnership marks a new chapter in the TNPL, bringing together a prominent news platform and one of the league’s dynamic teams.

Salem Spartans

Salem Spartans is a cricket team representing Salem district in the Tamil Nadu Cricket Association T20 League tournament, Tamil Nadu Premier League (TNPL). Vivo Chennai south distributor Selvakumar M owns the team.

Since the T20 format has come into play, IPL and similar events have made the T20 format even crazier than ever. And why not, when people are ready to adopt the format with open arms?

Since the IPL started in 2008, many other regional leagues have emerged. For instance, the Tamil Nadu Premier League, which has been active since 2016, aims to promote domestic cricket and its talent. The Tamil Nadu Cricket League (TNPL) was inaugurated by MS Dhoni.

For an update, the Salem Spartans, one of the eight teams in the TNPL, have added a slew of sponsors to their squad for a fruitful season. One of the latest additions that the franchise Salem Spartans has added to their list is a Title sponsorship deal with Taj777News in TNPL.

Taj777News will also be the associate partner of TNPL and will be responsible for displaying all the latest updates coming from the franchise in the form of videos, commentary, news, etc.

As an additive, Taj777News will also display articles and coverage through its digital app platform containing useful statistics and rankings of your favorite team or player.

With eight teams, the Tamil Nadu Cricket League is all set to launch its most awaited league run from Jul 05 to Aug 05, 2024, in its eighth edition of this season (2024). The cricket format will be T20.

Salem Spartans Playing XI Team (2024)

Abhishek S, M Ganesh Moorthi, Guru Sayee S, Jaganath Srinivas RS, Kavin R, Mohammed Adnan Khan, Sachin Rathi, Selva Kumaran N, Sunny Sandhu, Harish Kumar S, Vivek R, Aushik Srinivas R, Robin Singh Bist, Shijit Chandran P.
